segments.text: I notice the boy on the stool, balancing precariously as he reaches for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His tongue is poking out slightly, a telltale sign of his intense concentration.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so unstable, I can hardly believe he hasn’t tumbled off yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a knot in my stomach just watching him stretch so far.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He grips the plate tightly while trying to pull cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can sense his excitement, as if he’s about to achieve a great heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But what if he falls? I can only hope he realizes the risk before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
